title: Minimal Reliance on Foreign Aid
description: In 2022, Malaysia received only 0.67% of its central government expenses from net official development assistance, indicating a low dependency on foreign aid.

title: Low Arms Export Activity
description: In 2019, Malaysia's arms exports were valued at $1,000,000, reflecting minimal involvement in global arms trade.

title: Significant Forest Depletion
description: In 2021, Malaysia experienced a net forest depletion valued at $6.36 billion, highlighting significant environmental challenges.

title: Perfect Male School Enrollment
description: In 2017, Malaysia achieved a 100% net intake rate for males in grade 1, showcasing its commitment to primary education.

title: Minimal Battle-Related Deaths
description: In 2017, Malaysia reported only one battle-related death, indicating a peaceful domestic environment.
